AmplitudeOffsetTable.Description: Loss or gain between the test set's RF IN/OUT front panel connector and the mobile station's RF connector.

FrequencyList.Description: List of 2G/3G band mid-range frequencies in MHz

OffsetList.Description: List of correction offsets in dB (first offset applies to first frequency)

SecondAntennaOffsetList.Description: List of correction offsets in dB(first offset applies to first frequency) for second antenna (optional)
